message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'd be interested in. I'm asking for $15000 for it, but I'm open to negotiation.  Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I am very interested, but I can only afford to pay up to $14000 for it. I hope this offer is acceptable.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your interest. $14000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking for closer to my initial asking price of $15000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $14500? This would give us both a good deal.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate the flexibility shown. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet at $14500. I would like to propose $14200 as a counteroffer. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
